parameter.name: start
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Start address of the register and/or coils to write

parameter.name: trigger
parameter.label: trigger
parameter.description: Process command only if the command matches this string. Use asterisk (*) to match all

parameter.name: transform
parameter.label: transform
parameter.description: Transformation to apply to received commands. Use "default" to communicate that no transformation is done and value should be passed as is. Use SERVICENAME(ARG) to use transformation service. Any other value than the above types will be interpreted as static text, in which case the actual content of the command value is ignored.

parameter.name: valueType
parameter.label: Value type
parameter.description: How data is serialized to modbus
